annotations.description: If you missed this, I’ll be on my twitch at around 8:30 eastern. Twitch.tv/gregfromhtd
annotations.title: Streamo de Mayo!

textContent:
.75 oz lime juice
1 tspn agave or honey
1 oz pineapple juice
1.5 tspn Green Chartreuse
2 oz Tequila

Shake and strain into a coupe
Garnish with dehydrated lime wedge or lime wedge

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Aqx1y8_a3Qg
title: The Matador
